pages.text: Bombs are cool and all, but if you want to play on a server with some not-so-trustworthy individuals, you may not want to run the risk of someone blowing something you care about sky high.$(br2)Don't fret! There exists a gamerule that disable all player-controlled explosives added by Terramity.

Later on in the mod, you must throw a certain item into a black hole (which requires an explosive) to get a required item. The gamerule makes it to where when the black hole bomb explodes, it'll just drop the required item instead.$(br2)/gamerule AllowTerramityExplosives false
